thread.title: Form 8.3 - QED LN - Replacement

title: Form 8.3 - QED LN - Replacement
text:
0.0000 
LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 
The issuer advises that the following replaces the Sand Grove Capital Management Form 8.3 - QED LN announcement released at 01:26 BST today. 
In section 2 (a) the total has been amended from 6,150,000 to 6,490,231. 
All other details remain unchanged. 
The full corrected version is shown below. FORM 8.3 - Replacement PUBLIC OPENING POSITION DISCLOSURE/DEALING DISCLOSURE BY A PERSON WITH INTERESTS IN RELEVANT SECURITIES REPRESENTING 1% OR MORE Rule 8.3 of the Takeover Code (the “Code”) 
1. KEY INFORMATION (a) Identity of the person whose positions/dealings are being disclosed: Sand Grove Capital Management LLP as investment manager acting on behalf of Sand Grove Opportunities Master Fund LTD (b) Owner or controller of interests and short positions disclosed, if different from 1(a): The naming of nominee or vehicle companies is insufficient (c) Name of offeror/offeree in relation to whose relevant securities this form relates: Use a separate form for each offeror/offeree Quintain Estates & Dev PLC (d) If an exempt fund manager connected with an offeror/offeree, state this and specify identity of offeror/offeree: (e) Date position held/dealing undertaken: 31 July 2015 (f) Has the discloser previously disclosed, or are they today disclosing, under the Code in respect of any other party to this offer? Sand Grove Capital Management has previously disclosed Quintain Estates & Dev PLC 
2. POSITIONS OF THE PERSON MAKING THE DISCLOSURE 
(a) Interests and short positions in the relevant securities of the offeror or offeree to which the disclosure relates following the dealing (if any) Class of relevant security:
